verbs.description: While [ARG1: Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: a true master at manipulating his enemies] , his advisors are not always as deft .
While Trump is a true master at [V: manipulating] [ARG1: his enemies] , his advisors are not always as deft .
[ARGM-ADV: While Trump is a true master at manipulating his enemies] , [ARG1: his advisors] [V: are] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARGM-TMP: always] [ARG2: as deft] .
